shortdesc.ph: Represents the result of uplink and downlink Last-mile network probing.
Represents the result of uplink and downlink last-mile network probing.

plentry.pd: The state of Last-mile network probing. See .
The result of uplink Last-mile network probing. See .
The result of downlink Last-mile network probing. See .

The status of the last-mile network probe, including:
LASTMILE_PROBE_RESULT_COMPLETE (1): Probe completed.
LASTMILE_PROBE_RESULT_INCOMPLETE_NO_BWE (2): Probe incomplete due to lack of bandwidth estimation, possibly due to temporarily limited testing resources.
LASTMILE_PROBE_RESULT_UNAVAILABLE (3): Probe not conducted, possibly due to poor network conditions.
Uplink last-mile network probe result. See .
Downlink last-mile network probe result. See .
